item.description: Come show the NH state GOP how strong the presence is for Ron Paul in NH. This not only will help increase Paul's standing in NH among the GOP, it will also send the message that the GOP needs to support pro-liberty candidates in local elections if they want to capitalize on the grassroots supporters that Ron Paul has gathered. McCain and Ambassador Bolton will be speaking. Event will be held at the Yard restaurant in southern Manchester.
item.name: NH GOP State Committee Meeting (Rally)
